nodes.text: The Boosodians were a sentient species with gray skin and twenty eyes that lived in the galaxy. Amuncie Tidian was a Boosodian who worked as a forger.

Boosodian eyes were able to see a huge portion of the electromagnetic spectrum, which extended from x-rays to radio waves (though the latter was difficult to focus on). Additionally, Boosodians could focus on a specific part of the spectrum that they wished to watch closely.
